data.eml:eml: Troglocoelotes gen. n., a new genus of Coelotinae spiders (Araneae, Agelenidae) from caves in South China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Bing, Zhao, Zhe, Zhang, Chuntian, Li, Shuqiang (2019): Troglocoelotes gen. n., a new genus of Coelotinae spiders (Araneae, Agelenidae) from caves in South China. Zootaxa 4554 (1): 219-238, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4554.1.7
